about_the_game:
DISCOVER THE DEEPEST MYSTERIES OF ESPIONAGE AND FEEL THE RUSH OF VICTORY IN VIRTUAL REALITY

Take the role of soldiers, cryptologists, and communication experts during the Polish-Bolshevik War of 1920! Operate historical communication devices, decode enemy ciphers, and gain access to secret information that shaped the outcome of the war. Discover the inner workings of Bolshevik armored trains and participate in crucial missions that led to Poland’s victory.

Every aspect of the game has been meticulously crafted with the help of source materials or accurately replicated from historical exhibits. Players engage in documented historical events, with each character assigned a unique, vital role in determining the battle’s outcome. Now you can experience it in Virtual Reality!

Key Features:

  • A captivating story inspired by real events and featuring authentic Polish cryptographers and soldiers from the Polish-Bolshevik War

  • Elements of stealth, cryptographic puzzles, and interaction with historical communication devices

  • Attention to historical detail, with all devices and elements in the game carefully recreated from source materials and historical artifacts

  • Gameplay that blends action, puzzle-solving, and exploration, offering a unique combination of education and entertainment in Virtual Reality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-11700K, AMD Ryzen 7 5700G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060, AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: It is the end of 1920. The Polish-Bolshevik war has been going on for almost two years. The battle for Korosteń – a key railway junction and technical supply base – is underway. Break Bolshevik cyphers, ensure radio communication, and neutralise the fearsome armoured trains - now in Virtual Reality.
